text: Pala pōrkkaḷaṅkaḷil (uṅkaḷ eṇṇikkaik kuṟaivāka iruntum) niccayamāka allāh uṅkaḷukku utavi ceytirukkiṟāṉ. Eṉiṉum, huṉaiṉ pōr aṉṟu uṅkaḷai perumaiyil āḻttik koṇṭirunta uṅkaḷ atikamāṉa (makkaḷ) tokai uṅkaḷukku oru palaṉum aḷikkavillai. Pūmi ivvaḷavu vicālamāka iruntum (atucamayam atu) uṅkaḷukku mika nerukkamāki (kuṟuki) viṭṭatu. Nīṅkaḷ puṟaṅkāṭṭi ōṭavum talaippaṭṭīrkaḷ
